books.author: by Joe Posnanski
books.description: A biography of the legendary Penn State football coach.
books.name: PATERNO

books.author: by Edward Klein
books.description: A journalist argues that President Obama is callow, arrogant and unable to lead.
books.name: AMATEUR

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Dinesh D'Souza
books.description: An argument that President Obama is the architect of American decline.
books.name: OBAMA'S AMERICA

books.author: by Eric Metaxas
books.description: A biography of Dietrich Bonhoeffer, the German theologian who was hanged for his role in an assassination plot against Hitler.
books.name: BONHOEFFER

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The anchor of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Glenn Thrush
books.description: A reporter chronicles the president’s re-election battle; the third edition of Politico’s “Playbook 2012,” four digital books on the 2012 election.
books.name: OBAMA'S LAST STAND

books.author: by Mallory Factor
books.description: A Citadel professor claims that public unions, already a threat to elections and the American way of life, are targeting millions of Americans for forced unionization.
books.name: SHADOWBOSSES

books.author: by Ben Macintyre
books.description: How the Allies tricked the Nazis into believing that on D-Day they would attack somewhere other than Normandy.
books.name: DOUBLE CROSS

books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of the entrepreneur and Apple visionary who died last year.
books.name: STEVE JOBS

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: William E. Dodd, the U.S. ambassador to Germany, and his daughter, Martha, in 1930s Berlin.
books.name: IN THE GARDEN OF BEASTS

books.author: by Aaron Klein and Brenda J. Elliott
books.description: The authors reveal President Obama’s “radical blueprint” for a “progressive socialist takeover” if he is re-elected.
books.name: FOOL ME TWICE

books.author: by Jaycee Dugard
books.description: A woman describes being kidnapped at the age of 11 and held prisoner for 18 years by a convicted rapist and his wife.
books.name: A STOLEN LIFE
